name: void-merge-2048
description:
void-merge-2048

This is a game largely inspired by the original merging game 2048. This one has a small twist: the dreaded void ball that will complicate the task.

This game is my first project using the three.js library, and the first one I write in javascript too. I hope you'll have fun playing it!

How to play
  • Move your finger laterally to aim the next ball, and release your finger to launch it. You can also use your keyboard (A, D to rotate, space to shoot).
  • Merge balls with the same number on it, to get the highest score possible
  • Two void balls = void.
